action.primary: Promotes urination, reduces edema and disperses swelling

indications: Water Retention in the Heart, Liver and Kidneys
Edema of the upper abdomen, face, eye and extremities, nephritis
Lung Heat with Phlegm and mucus
Pulmonary emphysema due to Heart malfunction, cough, asthmatic cough-induced retention of Phlegm and Fluid, chronic bronchitis, pulmonary tuberculosis, stridor
Lymphosarcoma, scrofula, toothache, scabies, hemorrhoids, osteomyelitis, tubercular bone tumors, periostitis, granuloma

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Qi and Blood Deficiency.
Over dosage and long-term use must be strictly avoided.
Direct contact with the skin and mucus membranes may cause irritation, redness and discomfort.

notes: This herb may be made into an ointment and applied topically for scropfular lesions that have ulcerated and are seeping.
This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
